description.text: Indulge yourself with a lavish stay in Germany at the Berlin Marriott Hotel. The newly designed rooms of the Berlin Marriott Hotel offer a modern interpretation of the Bauhaus style right in the heart of the dynamic city of Berlin. Experience residential-like comfortable guest rooms with novel platform beds as well as innovative technology in the Guest Entertainment System and amenities like energy-saving and particularly hygienic circulating air-cooling units. Fuel up with delectable food and the finest of steaks from the Midtown Grill or enjoy delicious hot dogs and a variety of craft beers from The Big Dog. Explore downtown Berlin from our well-situated hotel near Potsdamer Platz and Tiergarten park and discover the citys many merits. Our exceptional customizable event spaces and conference rooms are a perfect fit for your meeting or wedding needs. Let us make your stay unforgettable at the Berlin Marriott Hotel. **Please note that our services may be limited due to government and hygiene restrictions.

Marriott Senior Discount, includes
Deluxe Room, 2 Doubles, 32sqm/344sqft,
Living/sitting area, Wireless internet,

The Ritz-Carlton is located on Potsdamer Platz in the heart of the city. Luxury 5-star superior hotel neighboring Berlins largest inner city park “Tiergarten”, the Berlin Philharmonic and Mies van der Rohes New National Gallery it is just a 7 minute walk to Brandenburg Gate and Reichstag. Richly designed and residential in feel, the 303 guest rooms and suites combine exquisite Art Deco design with contemporary touches and hand-selected furnishings recapture the essence of Berlins glamorous golden era. Guests can explore reinvented German cuisine along with an innovative sharing concept at POTS, the new staple to Berlins restaurant scene, enjoy afternoon tea at The Lounge, extraordinary cocktails at the multiple times awarded bar The Curtain Club or embrace an adventure for all senses at Fragrances Bar, where cocktails are inspired by luxury perfumes. Privacy is guaranteed in the Club Lounge. Wellness comprises of a fitness center, steam room, Finnish sauna and pool with countercurrent system.

Buy 2 rooms and get 50pct off 2nd room
Deluxe Room Twin, 2 Twins, 40sqm/430sqft,
Living/sitting area, Wireless internet,

Situated close to the Friedrichsttrasse, the hotel is the perfect base from which to explore the unique culture and sights of Berlin.Deemed as one of the best places to stay in the world by American Magazine, Condé Nast Traveler, The Regent Berlin offers luxury for all the senses. Known for its personal service and classic elegance, The Regent Berlin is one of the most prominent hotels in the capital city.The Regent Berlin has 195 beautiful guest rooms, including 39 suites, and offers the city's most spacious quarters with amentities including multiple telephone lines, satellite television, DVD player, computer and High-Speed Internet Access. Guests can choose from smoking and non-smoking rooms.When it's time to relax, guests at The Regent Berlin can enjoy a fully equipped fitness centre, for exercise, sauna or a massage. At the Gourmet-restaurant "Fischers Fritz" at The Regent Berlin, Chef de Cuisine Christian Lohse offers high class fish and seafood specialties.

ADVANCE SAVER

The boutique and designer Hotel Sofitel Berlin Gendarmenmarkt is considered to be one of the most elegant addresses in the heart of the bustling capital. The small, unique boutique hotel, with 70 rooms and 22 suites designed by Harald Klein, combines minimalist Cocoon design with unique details, such as the play of light and shadow and of glass and black marble.

Stay in the heart of Berlin, just seven minutes' walk from Potsdamer Platz. Simply park your car in the large parking garage and all the renowned sights, such as the Brandenburg Gate and the Reichstag, are just a short walk away. Feel at home in our fullyrefurbished rooms with comfortable beds. The reception and bar are open 24/7. Enjoy warm and cold snacks from our ibis kitchen at any time of day.

In one of the most vibrant areas of Berlin, where creativity, culture and art come together, hidden behind a high tech glass façade, nestles a warm and cosy hotel. 85 rooms and suites with exceptional interior and architecture provide a pleasant and unique living experience. The views of Berlin from the panorama windows of the top floor Suites are breathtaking. Other features: Parking in the hotels own garage free Internet throughout the hotel - next to the underground, train, and tramway stations live broadcasting of sport events in large screen.

The MEININGER Hotel Berlin Mitte ‘Humboldthaus’ in Berlin welcomes its guests in a relaxed and international atmosphere. It provides numerous rooms in different sizes, equipped with many amenities. Moreover, the MEININGER Hotel Berlin Mitte also offers a lounge with a bar and a shared kitchen.

hotel.name: Courtyard by Marriott Berlin City Center

description.text: Book your stay at Courtyard Berlin City Center, the ideal starting point for exploring Germany's vibrant capital city. Famous landmarks such as Museum Island, the Gendarmenmarkt and Checkpoint Charlie are all within walking distance of our hotel in the Mitte district. For more distant attractions, the nearby subway station makes all of Berlin easily accessible. Our restaurant offers international cuisine as well as regional specialties, helping you discover the flavors of Berlin, Germany. Head to our on-site shop to buy drinks and snacks throughout the day. Unwind in our modern guest rooms equipped with plush bedding, free Wi-Fi, a mini-refrigerator and a safe. Whether you're visiting our hotel for business or pleasure, Courtyard Berlin City Center looks forward to making your stay a pleasant one. **Please note that our fitness center, sauna and coffeeshop will be closed for the time being until further notice.

Marriott Senior Discount, includes
Deluxe Room, 1 King, Mini fridge,
26sqm/280sqft, Living/sitting area, Wireless

The 3-star Mercure Hotel Berlin Mitte is just a stone's throw from Potsdamer Platz and the Brandenburg Gate and has 120 partially air-conditioned rooms with WIFI. A meeting room with WIFI and DSL is available for business and private events. If arriving by train, we recommend traveling to the main train station. Tegel airport is 10.6 miles from the hotel and Schönefeld airport 15.5 miles away. You can reach us by car via the A100 highway. Gleisdreieck subway station is just a few minutes from the hotel.

Welcome to the Sheraton Berlin Grand Hotel Esplanade - The first Sheraton in Berlin. Introducing the Sheraton Berlin Grand Hotel Esplanade, an urban oasis of sleek design and intuitive service in the heart of the city's cultural district. Discover a striking new variety of Berlin hotel accommodation, just steps from world-class art museums, music, theatre and shopping at Kurfuerstendamm and the famous shopping center KaDeWe. Luxuriate in an ambiance that manages to soothe and energize with a single breath, where intelligent style meets cool comfort, and the city is yours to experience first-hand. Visit our inspiring hotel in Berlin, Germany, a unique hideaway positioned at a convenient address.

Marriott Senior Discount, includes
Classic Room Double, 1 King, Mini fridge,
29sqm/312sqft, Wireless internet,

The Best Western Hotel am Spittelmarkt is situated in a peaceful side street in the heart of the city, a short walk from famous Friedrichstrasse. Due to the central location right by Spittelmarkt, all interesting sights are easily reached within minutes. The nearby underground stop takes you quickly and directly to the two hubs of Alexanderplatz in the east and Zoologischer Garten in the west. You can also easily reach attractions such as the Exhibition Centre, the Branderburg Gate, Gendarmenmarkt Square and Potsdamer Platz with its bars and restaurants. Come and stay in comfortable and modern guest rooms, including family rooms, and enjoy the delicious and varied breakfast buffet to give you a great start to an active day in Berlin. Enjoy our breakfast buffet at the fee of 13.00 EUR per person per day.

Guests encounter a professional service and a friendly atmosphere which ensure a pleasant stay. The hotel Grimm's offers theme rooms and apartments fully equipped with all amenities. Guests are invited to relax in the in-house wellness area after an exciting sightseeing trip to the city.

An easy stroll from the Pullman Berlin Schweizerhof leads to the shops along Kurfürstendamm or to the KaDeWe department store. You can also visit the Berlin Zoo just opposite. Then again, why go outside when so much is happening right here in the hotel? No fewer than 18 meeting rooms are available for seminars and conferences.

The Hotel Crowne Plaza Berlin City Centre is located in the center of Berlin only a few steps away from the Kurfuerstendamm and the department store KaDeWe where outstanding opportunities for the shopping can be found. The Crowne Plaza Berlin City Centre with 423 rooms including 11 suites provides all the comforts of a First Class Superior hotel. Non smoking floors  accessible rooms a 24 hour room service and a business center with an Internet terminal free of charge are also available. An indoor pool and sauna that offer of massage and a fitness section with a wide variety of endurance and weight lifting machines are at the guests disposal. In Wilsons, The Prime Rib Restaurant we serve Original US Prime Rib a culinary classic from the USA. This juicy roast of the highest quality is carved directly from the rib. Wilsons Patio and Terrace is the expansion of the restaurant and invites with its lovely terrace in the quiet courtyard to enjoy culinary delights open air. The open Lobby Lounge with a direct view of the lively hotel lobby and offers light Californian cuisine. In the Kemmons Bar cocktails drinks and snacks are served. 14 meeting rooms including the conference center with natural lighting and an integrated ceiling height of 4.50m can accommodate functions up to 1000 delegates. High Speed Internet with up to 1.000 MBit with LAN is available in all rooms and conference facilities at the Crowne Plaza Berlin City Centre.

With its central location, the spacious 4-star Novotel Berlin Am Tiergarten is ideal for business travelers and tourists alike. It has 274 contemporary rooms, spread across six floors, eleven comfortable and well-equipped meeting rooms for up to 400 people as well as a sun terrace offering a fantastic view of the city. Why not visit the fitness center and terrace high above Berlin's rooftops? It is open around the clock and offers beauty treatments and relaxing massages.

Relax in one of our 198 rooms, comfortably furnished in a modern style.

Hotel Indigo Berlin Kudamm is the first Indigo hotel to open in Germany. It is a small boutique hotel offering 81 uniquely designed rooms. We are conveniently located in the heart of West Berlin, only minutes away from some of Berlins most famous attractions, counting amongst others, Boulevard Kurfuerstendamm, Berlin Zoo, Kaiser Wilhlem Memorial Church Gedaechtniskirche and KaDeWe department store. Hotel Indigo Berlin offers only non smoking rooms.

Inspired by Tsarist Russia, this 4-star hotel occupies a historic Art Nouveau building in Berlin's trendy Prenzlauer Berg district. It offers modern accommodations, free Wi-Fi, garage parking and bike rental. The Hotel Apartmenthaus Zarenhof is a beautifully restored early 20th-century building in a quiet courtyard. It is beside Eberswalderstraße Metro Station, only a 5-minute train ride from Alexanderplatz. The hotel offers a rich, Russian breakfast each morning in the breakfast lounge. This includes Russian specialties, such as blinis and caviar. Breakfast on Sundays includes sparkling wine and live harp music.

The hotel Seifert in Berlin is a family business that spoils its guests with warm hospitality. It is housed in a historic building and combines the typical charm of a Berlin guest house with the professionalism of a hotel. The hotel offers 50 single, double or family rooms with standard or comfort equipment for 3-5 persons. The restaurant provides a daily breakfast buffet.

The Adagio Berlin is situated just minutes from the world-famous Kurfürstendamm in the heart of West Berlin. Ranging from studio apartments for 2 people to two-roomed apartments for 4 people, our 132 apartments are fully equipped, featuring a kitchen, living room, desk etc. On-site facilities include breakfast service, Internet access, a meeting room and a fitness center where you can relax. In the center of Berlin City-West in the district of Charlottenburg is our 4 Star hotel. You will find us in the parallel street to the Kurfürstendamm. You can reach the Berlin Zoo, the Messe Berlin, the City Cube Berlin, the Gedächtniskirche and all other sights within a few minutes on foot or by public transport. In the entire hotel area, we offer you our free high-speed Wi-Fi. Our 80 spacious rooms at the Best Western Hotel Kantstrasse Berlin are decorated in a modern, bright design and include a flat-screen TV and laptop safe. For refreshment, our free coffee and tea station is available in your room. A modern bathroom and soundproof windows are standard. In the morning, enjoy our breakfast buffet with a wide selection of fresh food. Our Sky Sports Bar invites you to relax at any time. For the journey by car use our fully automatic underground parking. Both Berlin airports are easy to reach.

BEST WESTERN WEEKEND INCL. BREAKFAST

As a guest at the 4-star Mercure Berlin Tempelhof Airport, at the historic Tempelhof Airport, you are staying in the most sought-after event location and parking facility in Berlin. The hotel has 216 rooms and suites, a restaurant, bar, spa and event areacovering 11,840 sq.ft. with 10 rooms for meetings/events for up to 500 guests. Thanks to its central location, traveling to the hotel is easy: Ostbahnhof train station (ICE 3.1 miles), BBI Airport (8.7 miles), Tegel Airport (11.8 miles), A100 highway.
